attributes.action: Devolve East Anglia into a seperate state.
attributes.background: The East Anglians want to be seperate from Brexit, and the mess that is the United Kingdom. We will form our own country and run under our own house of parliament.

rejection.details: This would be for the people of East Anglia to decide. You could start a new petition calling for an action that is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, for example calling for a referendum on East Anglian independence from the UK.
